commands.name: SELECT
commands.description: Read data from table; acquires ACCESS SHARE table lock.

commands.name: COPY TO
commands.description: Export data to file; acquires ACCESS SHARE table lock.

commands.name: SELECT FOR UPDATE
commands.description: Locks selected rows to prevent concurrent modifications; also takes ROW SHARE table lock.

commands.name: SELECT FOR NO KEY UPDATE
commands.description: Locks selected rows for update of non-key columns; takes ROW SHARE table lock.

commands.name: SELECT FOR SHARE
commands.description: Locks selected rows to prevent modifications; takes ROW SHARE table lock.

commands.name: SELECT FOR KEY SHARE
commands.description: Locks selected rows to prevent key modifications; takes ROW SHARE table lock.

commands.name: DELETE
commands.description: Remove rows; takes ROW EXCLUSIVE table lock and row locks.

commands.name: INSERT
commands.description: Insert rows; takes ROW EXCLUSIVE table lock.

commands.name: MERGE
commands.description: Merge rows based on conditions; takes ROW EXCLUSIVE table lock.

commands.name: COPY FROM
commands.description: Import data from file; takes ROW EXCLUSIVE table lock.

commands.name: VACUUM
commands.description: Maintains storage; allows reads and writes; SHARE UPDATE EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: ANALYZE
commands.description: Collect statistics about table contents; SHARE UPDATE EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: CREATE INDEX CONCURRENTLY
commands.description: Build index allowing writes; SHARE UPDATE EXCLUSIVE on phases.

commands.name: CREATE STATISTICS
commands.description: Create extended statistics; SHARE UPDATE EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: COMMENT ON
commands.description: Add or modify comments on database objects; SHARE UPDATE EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: REINDEX CONCURRENTLY
commands.description: Rebuild indexes with minimal blocking; SHARE UPDATE EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: ALTER TABLE VALIDATE CONSTRAINT
commands.description: Validate a check constraint; SHARE UPDATE EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: ALTER TABLE SET WITHOUT CLUSTER
commands.description: Remove clustering information; SHARE UPDATE EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: ALTER TABLE SET STATISTICS
commands.description: Set statistics target for a column; SHARE UPDATE EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: ALTER TABLE SET TABLESPACE
commands.description: Move table to different tablespace; SHARE UPDATE EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: ALTER TABLE CLUSTER ON
commands.description: Set clustering index for table; SHARE UPDATE EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: ALTER TABLE SET FILLFACTOR
commands.description: Set table fillfactor parameter; SHARE UPDATE EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: ALTER INDEX RENAME
commands.description: Rename an index; SHARE UPDATE EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: CREATE INDEX
commands.description: Build index blocking writes; SHARE lock.

commands.name: CREATE TRIGGER
commands.description: Create a trigger on table; SHARE ROW EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: REFRESH MATERIALIZED VIEW CONCURRENTLY
commands.description: Concurrent refresh; EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: DROP TABLE
commands.description: Remove table completely; ACCESS EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: TRUNCATE
commands.description: Remove all rows; ACCESS EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: REINDEX
commands.description: Rebuild indexes; ACCESS EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: CLUSTER
commands.description: Reorder table based on index; ACCESS EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: VACUUM FULL
commands.description: Rewrites table to compact storage; requires ACCESS EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: REFRESH MATERIALIZED VIEW
commands.description: Refreshes view; ACCESS EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: ALTER TABLE ADD COLUMN
commands.description: Add column to table; ACCESS EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: ALTER TABLE DROP COLUMN
commands.description: Remove column from table; ACCESS EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: ALTER TABLE SET DATA TYPE
commands.description: Change column data type; ACCESS EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: ALTER TABLE RENAME
commands.description: Rename table; ACCESS EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: ALTER TABLE ADD CONSTRAINT
commands.description: Add table constraint; ACCESS EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: ALTER TABLE DROP CONSTRAINT
commands.description: Remove table constraint; ACCESS EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: ALTER TABLE SET STORAGE
commands.description: Set column storage type; ACCESS EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: ALTER TABLE SET COMPRESSION
commands.description: Set column compression method; ACCESS EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: ALTER TABLE ALTER CONSTRAINT
commands.description: Modify table constraint; ACCESS EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: ALTER INDEX SET TABLESPACE
commands.description: Move index to different tablespace; ACCESS EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: ALTER INDEX ATTACH PARTITION
commands.description: Attach index partition; ACCESS EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: ALTER INDEX SET FILLFACTOR
commands.description: Set index fillfactor; ACCESS EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: DROP INDEX
commands.description: Remove index; ACCESS EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: UPDATE (NO KEYS)
commands.description: UPDATE operation on non-key columns; takes ROW EXCLUSIVE table lock.

commands.name: UPDATE (KEYS)
commands.description: UPDATE operation on key columns; takes ROW EXCLUSIVE table lock.

commands.name: DROP INDEX CONCURRENTLY
commands.description: Drop index concurrently; ACCESS EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: ALTER TABLE SET/DROP DEFAULT
commands.description: Set or drop column default value; ACCESS EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: ALTER TABLE SET TOAST
commands.description: Set TOAST storage parameters; SHARE UPDATE EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: ALTER TABLE SET SEQUENCE
commands.description: Set sequence for column; ACCESS EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: ALTER TABLE SET N_DISTINCT
commands.description: Set n_distinct statistics for column; SHARE UPDATE EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: ALTER TABLE SET AUTOVACUUUM
commands.description: Set autovacuum parameters; SHARE UPDATE EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: ALTER TABLE RESET STORAGE
commands.description: Reset storage parameters; SHARE UPDATE EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: ALTER TABLE INHERIT PARENT
commands.description: Add table inheritance; ACCESS EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: ALTER TABLE ENABLE/DISABLE TRIGGER
commands.description: Enable or disable triggers; SHARE ROW EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: ALTER TABLE ENABLE/DISABLE RULE
commands.description: Enable or disable rules; SHARE ROW EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: ALTER TABLE ENABLE/DISABLE ROW LEVEL SECURITY
commands.description: Enable or disable row level security; ACCESS EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: ALTER TABLE DROP EXPRESSION
commands.description: Drop generated expression column; ACCESS EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: ALTER TABLE DETACH PARTITION (PARENT)
commands.description: Detach partition - parent table lock; SHARE UPDATE EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: ALTER TABLE DETACH PARTITION (TARGET/DEFAULT)
commands.description: Detach partition - target table lock; ACCESS EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: ALTER TABLE DETACH PARTITION CONCURRENTLY (PARENT)
commands.description: Detach partition concurrently - parent table; SHARE UPDATE EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: ALTER TABLE DETACH PARTITION CONCURRENTLY (TARGET/DEFAULT)
commands.description: Detach partition concurrently - target table; SHARE UPDATE EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: ALTER TABLE ATTACH PARTITION (PARENT)
commands.description: Attach partition - parent table lock; SHARE UPDATE EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: ALTER TABLE ATTACH PARTITION (TARGET/DEFAULT)
commands.description: Attach partition - target table lock; ACCESS EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: ALTER TABLE ADD FOREIGN KEY NOT VALID (PARENT)
commands.description: Add foreign key not valid - parent table; SHARE ROW EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: ALTER TABLE ADD FOREIGN KEY NOT VALID (CHILD)
commands.description: Add foreign key not valid - child table; SHARE ROW EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: ALTER TABLE ADD FOREIGN KEY (PARENT)
commands.description: Add foreign key - parent table lock; SHARE ROW EXCLUSIVE.

commands.name: ALTER TABLE ADD FOREIGN KEY (CHILD)
commands.description: Add foreign key - child table lock; SHARE ROW EXCLUSIVE.
